description: Microsoft Copilot is Microsoft's AI assistant powered by GPT-4, integrated across Windows, Office 365, Teams, and Bing for enterprise and personal productivity. Microsoft Copilot is Microsoft's AI assistant that brings GPT-4 capabilities across the entire Microsoft ecosystem. It's embedded in Windows 11, Microsoft 365 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams), Bing search, and Edge browser. Copilot Pro unlocks it inside all Office apps; Microsoft 365 Copilot is the enterprise version. Available free in Windows and Bing. Highlights: Deep Office 365 integration. Free in Windows 11 and Bing. GPT-4 powered. DALL-E 3 image generation. Enterprise-grade security.
